content: AC-D DM Ductile metal cutting disc Ductile metal cutting disc for gas saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Cutting disc designed for gas saw machines Thanks to its premium grain and bond system, the disc is faster, free-cutting, stronger and more durable Built for maximum working comfort Applications Cutting ductile metal with gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Ductile metal Tool type: Gas saw Blade / disc thickness: 0.156 in Technical Data | Base material | Ductile metal | Tool type | Gas saw | Blade / disc shape | Type 41 ### ITEMS- 436726 - Cutting disc 12x5/32x20 DM SP - Package Size 10 pc - 436728 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x20 DM SP - Package Size 10 pc - 436729 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x1 DM SP - Package Size 10 pc
